home.introduction: On this portfolio, I will tell you about my academic background, my professional background and my ambitions. The only particularity of this one, is the explanation of my choices since my first professional ambitions.
home.tips: A little advice before you start: This portfolio has a very precise order. I recommend that you start with the 'I' card.

about.second: For the moment, the only thing you need to know is that this project has been developed from scratch.
